attributes.action: Have Gary Oxenham legally recognised as a woman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gary Oxenham has long girly hair. He is very camp, uses a hair dryer, probably moisturizes and makes far too many jokes about making love to men.
This petition hopes to have his gender changed to 'female' in the hope that balance will be restored in the world

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
